definitions.definition: Effective immediately after a traumatic event such as an external shock.
definitions.example: Anterograde amnesia is a loss of the ability to create new memories after the event that caused the amnesia.

definitions.definition: Moving or occurring in the normal forward or downstream direction of.
definitions.example: Anterograde tracing is a research technique which is used to trace neural connections from their source to their point of termination. The opposite technique is retrograde tracing.
